title: “Green Finance Has Been Majorly Skewed Towards Renewable Energy" - BW Businessworld
content: “Green Finance Has Been Majorly Skewed Towards Renewable Energy"  BW Businessworld
description: C.K. Mishra, former secretary in the Ministry of Environment, Forest & Climate Change, and Chairperson, Expert Committee on Sustainable Finance, talks about India’s strategy to mitigate the impact of climate change and how relevant stakeholders from different industries are working towards formulating policies for a greener future, , Magazine 9 April 2022
